TopicTitle: How much freedom have you brought to the Kerbol System?

Articles.Content:
On my way to the Mun to claim it for a certain nation. Can you guess which?

Share more ships coated in American-ness if your cool enough.

Umm, none.

Considering I don't live in 'the land of the """"free""""', I wouldn't have plastered my ship with American flags.

I laughed at the French flag though, as well as the excessive amount of flags on the rocket, are you planning to plant a flag on every square centimetre of the MÃƒÂ¼n?
This looks like something alcohol contributed to
Ahh, I see you're playing in the new Merica mode! You remembered to demolish the VAB at the start, right?
None, Rule Britannia.

24 straight hours of kerbal career mode and some alcohol near the end had nothing to do with the creation of this beautiful piece of art! Also, I should have a taken a screen shot of the first stage boosters re-entry, the flag explosions were inspiring.... AND THE ROCKETS RED GLARE, THE BOMBS BURSTING IN AIR.... came true.
Lock this please, mods.

This violates no rules! Although it kinda hurts to see how much people hate America.

Still, not anywhere near as patriotic as that guy. 'MURICA got some problems, you know.

I could do this with my national flag, but I think it might send a VERY wrong message.

I am a German national

Also American freedom is only for the wealthy and powerful.
I'm busy establishing a new British Empire through the Kerbol System! No use for Murican flags on my rockets.

Time to be the patriot crasher.

SOUTH KOREA!

VLS Ripple Launch.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Gotta spread that 'murican missile love.

I'm busy establishing a new British Empire through the Kerbol System! No use for Murican flags on my rockets.

Same here, I managed to win a battle a while ago which gave me complete control over Laythe.

Why anyone would put real life national flags on a ship in a world where there are no such countries baffles me.

Besides that, I'll actually bite my tongue on the whole "freedom" thing as this would lead to a political thing which is against forum rules. I see this thread being closed very soon anyways.
Norway levels of freedom.
For any americans who need to boost their pride in murica:
There are countries that have put men on the moon, and there are countries that aren't America.

There are countries that have put men on the moon, and there are countries that aren't America.

There are countries that cancelled the Apollo program, and there are countries that aren't America.

There are countries that have used nuclear weapons on civilian targets, and there are countries that aren't America.

There are countries that have a higher percentage of their population in prison than anywhere else in the world, and there are countries that aren't America.

Want to keep going? I don't.

There are countries that have put men on the moon, and there are countries that aren't America.

You do realize that NASA is made up mostly of people from other countries that aren't America right? LOL

both those comments broke forum rules. especially the second one, and besides. It's not like all the other countries are all perfect and shiny.

Edited November 26, 2014 by Itsjustrocketscience

both those comments broke forum rules. especially the second one, and besides. It's not like all the other countries are all perfect and shiny.

Yes. So let's leave all the jingoistic "we're #1! Rah rah rah!" nonsense for the football grandstands where it belongs.

Which was the point of my post.

FOR THE GOOD OF ALL KERBALKIND, WOOOOOOO! *exploding space centers* *flaming spaceplanes* *erupting boosters*

In other words, all we celebrate is Kerbin as a whole! No clue what this 'Murica is...

FOR THE GOOD OF ALL KERBALKIND, WOOOOOOO! *exploding space centers* *flaming spaceplanes* *erupting boosters*

In other words, all we celebrate is Kerbin as a whole! No clue what this 'Murica is...

Edited November 27, 2014 by Felsmak
I claim new worlds in the name of all sentient beings, for adventure and SCIENCE... no freedom fries in my game, but maybe fried kerbotatoe snacks...

I claim new worlds in the name of all sentient beings, for adventure and SCIENCE... no freedom fries in my game, but maybe fried kerbotatoe snacks...

Its pronounced 'ker-bo-TAH-to'
Thanks for putting that right!
